section.heading: Scope.
section.text: This chapter applies to each contract for the purchase or lease by the State Board of all or any part of a voting system.

para.text: The sale or lease is contingent on successful completion of all acceptance testing; and
If the product fails acceptance testing, the State Board may cancel the contract without penalty.

section.heading: Governing Law.
section.text: The contract shall provide that Maryland law prevails in all matters.

section.heading: Source Code Protection.
section.text: The contract shall provide that, if the vendor discontinues its support of the system for any reason, the State Board is authorized to use the archival system source codes and other software in any way that the State Board considers necessary or appropriate to support the continued use of the system.

annotations.annotation: Election Law Article, §§2-102(b)(4), 2-202(b), and 9-102(b), Annotated Code of Maryland
